extendedInfo.description: The goal of The World's Smallest Political Quiz is to give a fast, fun, and accurate assessment of a person's overall political views, and to place those views on a new multi-spectrum "political map" that is far more accurate, insightful, and thorough than older political guidelines (such as the "left-right" line).

reviews.title: Galaxy nexus
reviews.comment: I love the online version, and I could love the mobile version to, if only the dot would appear at the right place. Now it always, no matter what they input is, appears outside the matrix in the top left corner. On my tablet it works well by th way.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very accurate. It tells me I\'m really liberal. I know. LOL :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple
reviews.comment: Pretty cool. I wasn\'t sure where I fit in until I studied libertarianism. I thought it most closely matched my views and this app agrees.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Accurate
reviews.comment: Its very accurate, I took it several times and they prove that I\'m Right-Libertarian or in another word to put it, Libertarian Conservative.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great but for two things missing: 1- how many quizes are reflected in the stats; 2 - ability to clear stats without an uninstall/reinstall cycle
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not very accurate, too short
reviews.comment: Could be a lot better. As is, the limitations lie not on the app itself but on the quiz. It\'s far too short, too vague and extremely biased towards Libertarianism. Would rather do the Political Matrix or the moral politics political quiz.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Short and crap
reviews.comment: Very short. Just a couple of questions. Once and done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more
reviews.comment: We need an i dont give a crap button
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absurd
reviews.comment: This is a poorly researched effort at categorizing political ideologies. Do not take an eight second quiz for political knowledge and identification. Go study.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix the dot
reviews.comment: The quiz is nice, buy it loses a lot of its appeal because the result is in the wrong place.
reviews.author: T.M. Breuel

reviews.comment: The quiz is accurate and fun to take!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pretty accurate, liberal/libertarian here, I didn\'t think it would be able to get it so close with so few questions! Well done to the dev :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app no problems for G1. Libertarian/ Conservative!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Force close on X10 mini. Uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than original test
reviews.comment: From when I was in high school...that was geared towards republicans and democrats, and the questions were all social issues like abortions, gun control, immigration, gay rights, etc.  This test shows where one really lies on the political spectrum.  Those who say is biased towards libertarianism obviously haven\'t had multiple people take the quiz; I\'ve personally given the test to a few centrist, and very far left liberals.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not very accurate
reviews.comment: Too short and not enough listed issues. Cool idea though. I recommend adding on to this app.
reviews.author: A Google User
